message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I think we can do better than this, but it's a good starting point.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share since I'm making the first offer.
Meet you halfway? I think I deserve more than that, especially since I'm the one who's going to have to respond to your offers for the next 11 rounds!
You think you deserve more just because you made the first offer? I don't think so. Let's try this again, with a slightly better split for me.
I'm not willing to give up too much more. I think this is a fair compromise, considering I'm the one making the offer.
You're trying to squeeze me out, Bob. I'm not going to accept an offer that leaves me with less than I had in previous offers. Let's keep negotiating!
I'm not going to let you walk all over me, Bob. This is a fair compromise, and I think it's time for you to meet me halfway.
I'm not going to back down. I think I deserve a bigger share, and I'm willing to take a risk to get it.
You're taking a big risk, Bob. I'm not going to fall for it. I think I can do better than this, and I'm not going to give up my chances of getting a bigger share.
I'm not going to let you push me around, Bob. This is my best offer so far, and I think it's time for you to accept it.
I'm not going to settle for anything less than what I think I deserve. I'm willing to take the risk of getting nothing if I don't get a better deal.
You're bluffing, Bob. I'm not going to fall for it. This is an extremely unfair offer, and I'm not going to accept it.
I'm not going to let you walk away with the whole deal, Bob. This is a fair compromise, and I think it's time for you to accept it.
I'm not going to back down. I think I deserve a bigger share, and I'm willing to take the risk of getting nothing if I don't get a better deal.

You're being completely unreasonable, Bob. This is an insult. I'm not going to accept an offer that leaves me with a tiny fraction of the money. It's time to think about walking away with nothing if you can't be reasonable.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm not going to make any more concessions. It's time for you to accept it or walk away with nothing.
I'm not going to settle for anything less than what I think I deserve. I'm willing to take the risk of getting nothing if I don't get a better deal.
That's it, Bob. I've had enough of your games. I'm rejecting your offer and we're walking away with nothing. It's a tie, and I'm okay with that.
